class.name: TokenIntegerFull

class.desc: An integer literal, and additional information about the integer.

var.name: size
var.desc: The size of this integer in bits. Can be zero to mean the size was not specified.

var.name: flagUnsigned
var.desc: True if the integer is unsigned.

var.name: flagNumberNeg
var.desc: True if the number is negative.

var.name: integer
var.desc: The token that stores this integer's digits.
